patient_snapshot.text: The patient died of a pulmonary embolism, the underlying cause of which is currently undetermined.

key_problems.text: shortness of breath and chest pain

pertinent_history.text: The patient was a 35-year-old African-American male with no significant past medical history.
The patient had three episodes of thromboemboli in the pulmonary vasculature that were at least a few days old because the emboli that were organizing were adherent to the vessel wall.
